text: Clyde Godfrey Butts was born 8 July, 1957 in Perseverance, Guyana and died 8 December, 2023 in Eccles, Guyana. He was a West Indies cricketer who played 7 tests from 1985 to 1988. He also played for Guyana and Demerara in first-class cricket. He was killed in a car accident on the same day as Joe Solomon died. ==Other websites== * Category:1957 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Guyanese cricketers
title: Clyde Butts
